SENT.plain: We have constructed a 1.5-Mb contig spanning the distal half of the critical region for cat eye syndrome on human chromosome 22 from D22S543 to D22S181
The contig consists of 20 P1 artificial chromosome (PAC) clones and 11 bacterial artificial chromosome (BAC) clones screened from 2 BAC and 2 PAC libraries
Continuous overlap between the clones was confirmed using vectorette PCR and riboprobes
Despite the instability of this region in a previous YAC contig, only 1 BAC showed a minor instability and then in only one isolation
This contig is now providing the basis for genomic sequencing and gene identification in the cat eye syndrome critical region
